title: murugan tirunAmam
sahitya:
murugan tirunAmam tarumE paramAnandam parugavE perugum oru arumaiyAna amudam


anupallavi

  karudik-karudi adanaik-kanavinilum nanavinilum urugi urugi uLLam karaiyavE smarittAl


caraNam    Om enum nAdam kUDa nAman adanai manadil Oda kAma krOda lObhamODum kSEma lAbamum kUDum
sAma vEda gAnattODu nEma niSTai yAvumE sAdhanai sheidu nADum nAthan avan adanAl
